name: Shape of shades
description:
Shape of shades

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare #26 "Minimalism"

Abstract game where you use shadows to orient yourself and go through walls to escape enemies.

How to play

Find every keys (blue rectangles) and go to the exit (purple rectangle) to complete each levels.
Avoid turret's bullets (orange rectangle) and enemies rushing at you (white rectangle).

Controls
  • WASD / AZSD / arrow keys to move.
  • <Space> to go through walls
Screenshots

Tools used : Haxe, HaxePunk, Circuli for sounds, Gimp, FlashDevelop
